name: Calendly
short_description: Schedule meetings and manage appointments efficiently.
title: Calendly MCP Server
description: The Calendly MCP server helps your AI agents manage your meeting schedules. It can create meetings, handle cancellations, and manage all your scheduling tasks automatically.

mcp_content.heading: How to Cancel Your Meetings?
mcp_content.description: Calendly MCP helps you cancel any meeting quickly. Just pick the meeting and your AI will handle the cancellation.

total_tools.name: Create One-Off Meeting
total_tools.description: Creates a new one-off meeting in Calendly.

mcp_content.heading: Create Single Meeting Sessions
mcp_content.description: Make quick, one-time meeting slots. Perfect for setting up individual sessions without repeat schedules.

total_tools.name: Cancel Scheduled Event
total_tools.description: Cancels a scheduled event with a specified reason for the cancellation.

mcp_content.heading: How to Cancel with a Reason?
mcp_content.description: Calendly MCP lets you cancel meetings and tell people why. Your AI sends the message to everyone in the meeting.

total_tools.name: Mark Invitee as No Show
total_tools.description: Marks a specific invitee as a no show.

mcp_content.heading: Track Missing Attendees
mcp_content.description: Mark when someone misses a meeting. Helps you keep track of who shows up and who doesn't.

total_tools.name: Find Event
total_tools.description: Finds an event based on UUID.

mcp_content.heading: How to Find Specific Meetings?
mcp_content.description: Calendly MCP helps you find any meeting using its ID number. Quick and simple way to check meeting details.

total_tools.name: Find User
total_tools.description: Searches for a User by name or email.

mcp_content.heading: Find Calendly Users
mcp_content.description: Search for people by their name or email. Easy way to find someone's schedule.

total_tools.name: Get User
total_tools.description: Retrieves comprehensive details for an existing calendly user.

mcp_content.heading: How to View User Information?
mcp_content.description: Calendly MCP shows you all details about a user. See their settings and schedule in one place.

mcp_page_content.title: How Can Your AI Agents Use the Calendly MCP Server?
mcp_page_content.description: Make meeting scheduling simple with AI tools. Your assistant helps with everything from creating meetings to handling cancellations, so you can focus on the important stuff.
